EmailTemplate.name: Non Completion of CIF Form
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Castlight_Opportunity__c.AccountId__c} - Castlight Engage Client Information Form (CIF) Completion Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This e-mail is a reminder to advise that Engage CIF form must be completed for the following products: Engage Elite, Engage Elite Plus, Engage Essential, Engage Essential Plus when the product stage = Sold or IGAP Sold. To create the Castlight Client Information Form (CIF), please navigate to the "Castlight Engage CIF" button located on the Action Panel within the Opportunity: {!Castlight_Opportunity__c.OpportunityId__c}
